languages.text: "Вместе мы заставим этого мерзавца ответить за свои преступления. Он изопьет всю чашу гнева Его, поданную нашими руками".
"Together, we shall make that scoundrel pay for his crimes. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that will be delivered by our hands."
languages.original_text: "Вместе мы заставим этого мерзавца ответить за свои преступления. Он изопьет всю чашу гнева Его, поданную нашими руками".

traits.locale_text: "Together, we will make that scoundrel pay for his transgressions. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that our hands will deliver."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Together, we will make that scoundrel pay for his transgressions. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that our hands will deliver."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Together, we will make that scoundrel pay for his transgressions. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that our hands will deliver."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Together, we will make that scoundrel pay for his transgressions. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that our hands will deliver."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Together, we shall make that scoundrel pay for his crimes. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that will be delivered by our hands."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Together, we shall make that scoundrel pay for his crimes. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that will be delivered by our hands."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “我们要一起抓住那个无赖，让他为他的恶行付出代价，让他饱饮神皇的怒火。我们会亲手将他绳之以法。”
languages.original_text: "Together, we shall make that scoundrel pay for his crimes. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that will be delivered by our hands."

traits.locale_text: “我们要一起抓住那个无赖，让他为他的恶行付出代价。让他饱饮帝皇的愤怒吧，我们会亲手将他绳之以法。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「共に、あの悪党に罪の代償を支払わせよう。私達の手で、奴に主の怒りを注いだ杯を大量に飲ませ続けるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Together, we shall make that scoundrel pay for his crimes. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that will be delivered by our hands."

traits.locale_text: 「共に、あの悪党に罪の代償を支払わせよう。私達の手で、奴に主の怒りを注いだ杯を大量に飲ませ続けるのだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Junt{mf|os|as} haremos que ese canalla pague por sus delitos. Que beba hasta hartarse de la copa de Su ira que recibirá de nuestras manos».
languages.original_text: "Together, we shall make that scoundrel pay for his crimes. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that will be delivered by our hands."

traits.locale_text: «Junt{mf|os|as} haremos que ese canalla pague por sus infracciones. Que beba hasta hartarse de la copa de Su ira, copa que le entregarán nuestras manos».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Gemeinsam werden wir diesen Schuft für seine Verbrechen bezahlen lassen. Er soll den Kelch der Wut des Imperators bis auf den letzten Tropfen leeren, und unsere Hände werden ihm diesen Kelch überreichen."
languages.original_text: "Together, we shall make that scoundrel pay for his crimes. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that will be delivered by our hands."

traits.locale_text: "Gemeinsam werden wir diesen Schuft für seine Verbrechen bezahlen lassen. Er soll den Kelch der Wut des Imperators bis auf den letzten Tropfen leeren, und unsere Hände werden ihm diesen Kelch überreichen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Ensemble, nous ferons payer ses crimes à ce misérable. Nos mains porteront à ses lèvres la coupe de Sa colère et la lui feront boire jusqu'à la lie. »
languages.original_text: "Together, we shall make that scoundrel pay for his crimes. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that will be delivered by our hands."

traits.locale_text: « Ensemble, nous ferons payer ses crimes à ce misérable. Nos mains porteront à ses lèvres la coupe de Sa colère et la lui feront boire jusqu'à la lie. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Birlikte o alçağın suçlarının cezasını çekmesini sağlayacağız. O'nun gazabının kupasından kana kana içsin. O kupayı ona teslim eden eller, bizim ellerimiz olsun."
languages.original_text: "Together, we shall make that scoundrel pay for his crimes. Let him drink the cup of His wrath to full, a cup that will be delivered by our hands."

traits.locale_text: "Birlikte, o alçağın suçlarının cezasını çekmesini sağlayacağız. O'nun gazabının kupasından kana kana içsin ve o kupayı ona teslim eden eller, bizim ellerimiz olsun."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
